metadata.title: CVE-2023-1402 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The course participation report required additional checks to prevent rolesbeing displayed which the user did not have access to view.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
